entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Layout Cycle Detected when a Flexlayout is inside a StackLayout on Windows #11909
  • Unable to archive app if it references a .NET Standard 2.0 class library #11906
  • Webview.EvaluateJavaScriptAsync does not execute with newline #11905
    Backlog
  • Android Release mode build doesn't work #11901
  • ListView does not work properly on Android #11900
    Backlog
  • Problem with CollectionView which is wrapped in ContentView #11897
    Backlog
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #11896
    Backlog
  • iOS Rotate animation is very choppy due to LOTS of unneceesary measure cycles and makes application unusably slow #11891
    Backlog
  • Mac Catalyst Binding Library not callable #11890

Closed

  • Maui Android Crash CarouselView IndicatorView on navigating second time #11310
    Backlog
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11385
  • Gtk sharp abandoned? #11889
  • I have problem with run iOS simulator (error DVTITunesSoftwareServiceFoundation) #11899
  • [Android] ScrollView accessibility is broken #11157
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11838
  • MAUI program cannot be started in net7.0-android33.0 #11869

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove non platform TFM and sync up SupportedOSPlatformVersion #11910
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907

Merged

  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • [net7.0] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11759
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1418.22 to 1.0.1462.37 #11898
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11888
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [build] Fix changelog workflow #11895

Updated

  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Update Essentials Email API Docs #11868
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix being unable to access some resources #11214
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Update Essentials FilePicker API Docs #11870
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
